scripts.merge-reports: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > finalReport.json && npx marge finalReport.json
scripts.delete-all-results: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-final-result && npm run delete-mochawesome-report
scripts.cypress-suite-qa: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-final-result && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run runAllTests-qa && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > finalReport.json && npx marge finalReport.json && npx open-cli mochawesome-report/finalReport.html
scripts.cypress-suite-staging: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-final-result && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run runAllTests-staging && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > finalReport.json && npx marge finalReport.json && npx open-cli mochawesome-report/finalReport.html
scripts.cypress-suite-prod: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-final-result && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run runAllTests-prod && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > finalReport.json && npx marge finalReport.json && npx open-cli mochawesome-report/finalReport.html
